Translations.Text: “Ndi otulutsa moto ku zikhotwa (pomenyetsa miyendo m’miyala)
“Ndi kuulutsa fumbi lambiri (kwa adani) nthawi imeneyo
“Ndithu munthu ali wokanira Mbuye wake, (sathokoza Allah pa zimene amdalitsa nazo)
“Ndithudi iye pa zimenezi ndi mboni (yodzichitira yekha kupyolera mzochitachita zake)
“Ndipo ndithu iye ndiwokonda chuma kwambiri (ndiponso ngwamsulizo)
“Ndikudzasonkhanitsidwa ndi kuonekera poyera zomwe zidali m’mitima
“Ndithu tsiku limenelo Mbuye wawo adzawadziwa kwambiri (ndikuwalongosolera zonse zochita zawo)
